original_title: Hackaday Podcast Episode 307: CNC Tattoos, The Big Chill in Space, and PCB Things
original_content:
The answer is: Elliot Williams, Al Williams, and a dozen or so great hacks. The question?  What do you get this week on the Hackaday podcast? This weeks hacks ran from smart ring hacking, to computerized tattoos. Keyboards, PCBs, and bicycles all make appearances, too.
Be sure to try to guess the Whats that sound? You could score a cool Hackaday Podcast T.
For the cant miss this week, Hackaday talks about how to dispose of the body in outer space and when setting your ships clock involved watching a ball drop.
